Package controller

Class FlexiblePF

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AbstractPF
      • controller.FlexiblePF
  • public class FlexiblePF
extends AbstractPF
    This class extends the AbstractPF class and calls the view to display the submenu for the flexible portfolios. Options include creation of a portfolio , modifying a portfolio, uploading existing portfolio, composition examination, cost basis, total value of a portfolio and performance graph over an interval.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FlexiblePF​(StockView view, Model model, java.lang.String filePath, java.util.ArrayList<java.time.LocalDate> datesFromAPI)
      Constructs a Flexible portfolio that calls the model and view to perform various actions on a flexible portfolio such as creation, update, getting composition, total and cost basis and performance analysis of a portfolio over a certain range.

      This implementation displays the submenu for the flexible portfolios.
